>>How do you decide when the network has reached a decision?
>>    
>>
>
>We've tried some different approaches to this.
>
Have you tried the method I used in my shape-recogniser, where the 
network sets a particular output when it's reached a decision? If it 
doesn't reach a decision in the maximum time steps allowed, that counts 
as a failure.

--Darren
